item.title: Report X-2023081356
item.description:
Report X-2023081356

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-03T00:35:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: MCCOMB
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: ILLINOIS CENTRAL RAILROAD COMP
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On August 14, CN Transportation crews observed liquid dripping down the sides on UTLX 125075. The railcar was isolated and all required notifications were made. CN response contractor responded to the site. Upon approaching the railcar, liquid was observed streaming down the sides of the railcar and pooling on the ground below the railcar. Under closer inspection, liquid was observed coming from the liquid eduction line. Attempts were made to tighten the cap and were unsuccessful. The pressure was relieved which stopped the leak. The liquid eduction cap was again attempted to be tightened again; 7 additional turns were achieved. The cap was removed to check if a gasket was installed. No gasket was observed. A gasket was installed in the liquid eduction cap and teflon tape was applied to the threads. The liquid eduction cap was properly installed. The exterior of the railcar was decontaminated. The railcar was released onto destination.
